pullrequest.title: add URDF version of robot model

content.raw:
Cool! Some other things to be tweaked:

* Surface params on the wheels so the contacts don't flicker
* The robot exploded for me after rolling for a while and ended up curled in the world origin, this usually happens when the physics engine receives some NaNs. After we have all the inertias, we can start looking at physics engine params to improve that.
content.html:
Cool! Some other things to be tweaked:

  • Surface params on the wheels so the contacts don't flicker
  • The robot exploded for me after rolling for a while and ended up curled in the world origin, this usually happens when the physics engine receives some NaNs. After we have all the inertias, we can start looking at physics engine params to improve that.
